spells.name: Bestow Weapon Proficiency
spells.description: Grant a creature proficiency in a single weapon for short period of time.

spells.name: Litany of Eloquence
spells.description: Fascinates a single creature for 1 round.

spells.name: Litany of Warding
spells.description: You gain two additional attacks of opportunity for 1 round.

spells.name: Magic Siege Engine
spells.description: Siege engine gains +1 on targeting and damage rolls.

spells.name: Protection from Good, Communal
spells.description: As protection from good, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Protection from Law, Communal
spells.description: As protection from law, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
